generated.css: body{font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;margin:0;padding:0}#app{display:grid;grid-template-columns:25% 1fr;grid-template-areas:"A B"}#main{grid-area:B}ul{list-style:none}#menu{grid-area:A;width:25%;min-width:250px;height:100vh;margin:0;background:#d3d3d3;position:fixed;display:grid;justify-content:center;grid-template-rows:10% 1fr 30%;z-index:1}#menu .title h1{font-weight:100;margin-bottom:0;font-size:2rem}#menu .title h1 span{font-weight:700!important;color:#ff1818}#menu .title article{letter-spacing:.2px;word-spacing:0;color:#1e8018;font-size:1rem}#menu .menu{display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center}#menu .menu a{text-decoration:none;padding:1rem;margin:10px 0;transition:.5s ease-in-out}#menu .menu a:hover{background:#ffa600;color:#000}#menu .footer{display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;flex-direction:column;font-size:.8rem}#menu .footer a{color:#1e8018}#menu .footer a:hover{color:#ff1818}#menu .footer span{width:inherit}#menu .footer span .signature{margin-bottom:10px;text-align:center;font-weight:700}#menu .footer span a{font-size:2rem;margin:1rem}.tirage{display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;flex-direction:column}.tirage .search{min-width:400px;background:#ffa600;padding:1rem;margin:10px 0;right:0}.tirage .search p{margin:10px 0 0;font-size:1rem;color:#1e8018;opacity:.9}.tirage .search span{margin:10px}.tirage .search span input[type=text]{padding:10px;font-size:17px;background-color:#ececec;border:0 solid #6e926c;border-radius:0 50px 50px 0;box-shadow:0 0 0 rgba(66,66,66,0);text-shadow:-50px 0 0 rgba(66,66,66,0);border-radius:50px 0 0 50px;background:#d3d3d3;letter-spacing:.1rem;color:#1e8018}.tirage .search span input[type=text]:focus{outline:none}.tirage .search span input[type=button]{padding:10px;font-size:17px;background-color:#ececec;border:0 solid #6e926c;box-shadow:0 0 0 rgba(66,66,66,0);text-shadow:-50px 0 0 rgba(66,66,66,0);border-radius:0 50px 50px 0;background:#000;color:#d3d3d3;cursor:pointer}.tirage .search span input[type=button]:focus{outline:none}.tirage .search span input[type=button]:hover{transform:scale(1.1)}.tirage .search span input[type=button]:active{transform:scale(1)}.cocktail-contenaire{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;list-style:none;justify-content:center;align-items:center}.cocktail-contenaire .cocktail-eacth{margin:3px;padding:5px;background:#d3d3d3;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;flex-direction:column}.cocktail-contenaire .cocktail-eacth p{font-size:.8rem;font-weight:700}.cocktail-contenaire .cocktail-eacth h1{color:#ff1818;font-size:1rem;margin:0}.cocktail-contenaire .cocktail-eacth .name-contenaire{display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;justify-content:center}.cocktail-contenaire .cocktail-eacth strong{color:#1e8018;text-decoration:underline}.cocktail-contenaire .cocktail-eacth:hover{transform:scale(1.02);background:#ffa600}.cocktail-contenaire .cocktail-eacth:hover h1{color:#000}.cocktail-contenaire .cocktail-eacth img{width:150px;height:150px;margin:5px}.resultError{color:#ff1818}.resultError span{font-weight:100;color:#ffa600;font-size:1.2rem}.hasard{height:100vh;display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:space-evenly}.hasard h1{color:#1e8018}.hasard .basic{background:#d3d3d3;padding:0 2rem;transition:.5s ease-in-out;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;flex-direction:column}.hasard .basic strong{color:#ff1818;font-size:1rem;margin:0}.hasard .basic img{width:400px;height:400px;left:50%}.hasard .basic:hover{background:#000}.hasard .basic:hover h1,.hasard .basic:hover h2,.hasard .basic:hover h3{color:#fff}.hasard .ingredient{background:#ffa600;padding:1rem;height:auto}.hasard .ingredient h1{font-size:1rem;position:relative}.custom-loader{width:50px;height:50px;display:grid}.custom-loader:after,.custom-loader:before{content:"";grid-area:1/1;--c:radial-gradient(farthest-side,#ffba3a 92%,transparent);background:var(--c) 50% 0,var(--c) 50% 100%,var(--c) 100% 50%,var(--c) 0 50%;background-size:12px 12px;background-repeat:no-repeat;animation:s2 1s infinite}.custom-loader:before{margin:4px;filter:hue-rotate(45deg);background-size:8px 8px;animation-timing-function:linear}@keyframes s2{to{transform:rotate(.5turn)}}.ingredient-contenaire{display:grid;justify-content:center;align-items:center;margin:0;grid-template-columns:1fr 35%;align-items:flex-start;grid-template-areas:"A B"}.ingredient-contenaire h2{color:#ffa600;text-align:center}.ingredient-contenaire .liste-ingredient{grid-area:B;height:100vh;overflow:auto}.ingredient-contenaire .liste-ingredient input{display:none}.ingredient-contenaire .liste-ingredient input:checked+label{background:#ffa600;opacity:1;color:#1e8018}.ingredient-contenaire .liste-ingredient label{display:block;font-size:1.2rem;font-weight:700;line-height:2rem;padding:5px;text-transform:uppercase;opacity:.4}.ingredient-contenaire .liste-ingredient label:hover{opacity:.8}.ingredient-contenaire .result-ingredient{grid-area:A;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center;align-items:center}.ingredient-contenaire .result-ingredient span{color:#ff1818}.ingredient-contenaire .result-ingredient .cocktail-eacth{width:200px;height:200px;padding:5px}.ingredient-contenaire .result-ingredient .cocktail-eacth h1{color:#1e8018}.alphabet{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 35%}.alphabet .alphabet-contenaire{height:10%;display:flex;flex-direction:row;flex-wrap:wrap}.alphabet .alphabet-contenaire input{display:none}.alphabet .alphabet-contenaire input:checked{background:#1e8018;color:#fff}.alphabet .alphabet-contenaire label{display:block;font-size:1.2rem;padding:1rem;margin:5px;background:#ffa600;transition:.2s ease-in-out}.alphabet .alphabet-contenaire label:hover{transform:scale(1.1);background:#1e8018;color:#fff}
